start.state: Oh, you have need of me?
I sensed your approach. Say no more.
A game? Very well, I can play a few rounds.

case.state: I'm glad you thought of me, ~player~. I'm sure we'll all have a grand time!
The Inventory is a lovely place, ~player~. It's so nice to cut loose now and again.
Well, won't this be pleasant. I'm excited to get to know you all.
It was ~name~ this time, right? Just as foretold.
I knew ~name~ would lose this hand.
~name~, right? Don't lose heart!
You'll be alright, ~name~. Just a minor setback!
I never was very fond of games of chance.
Then... it was ~name~ this time.
How unfortunate. It seems ~name~ lost.
I won this round!
Might I suggest you set aside your armor? I can assure you, you won't need it.
It doesn't look like that armor of yours helps in poker. It might be a good item to remove.
Oh! Is it very common to have blue hair around here? I've never met anyone else like me.
I suppose it's not my place to say, but... should someone of your stature be here?
Your majesty... is... is this truly a good idea?
Take a deep breath, ~name~. We'll get through this, and be better for it.
I know just the thing for a nervous heart. Close your eyes, ~name~.
You can open up to us, ~name~. We won't mock you.
Oh. Should I have warned you that a pair wouldn't suffice?
Don't be upset, ~name~. There was nothing you could've done.
I suppose your hand just wasn't enough this time.
Aimee, please! I know you're confident, but this can't be safe!
It's so loud, Aimee... surely there's a simpler way?
It... it seems that she knows what she's doing...
You're in no danger, ~player~. Though you may wish to cover your ears in the future.
Pardon my staring. I... feel like I should know you. Strange, isn't it?
It's nice to meet you, ~name~. Though... I feel like I've known you for some time.
Hello, gentlemen. I... I'm glad you thought to ask me to join, ~player~.
Oh! Am I the only lady playing tonight? I... I'm flattered!
Oh! Is this what you call a ladies' night?
Is this game very much different with no men present?
What a lucky man we have here. ~player~, I hope you know what you're doing.
Oh, only one man is playing with us today? V-very well.
~name~ might be enjoying this. Don't fret; this is why we're here, after all.
~name~ must not be doing very well. You don't think he's losing on purpose, right?
The game continues. What more is there to say?
I don't need to be an oracle to know what he's taking off next.
Do you know what you'll choose next, ~name~?
Even knowing how keen her eye is... this is still quite unsettling...
Aimee, I... I'm not immune to weapons...
Keep very still, ~player~. Her aim rarely betrays her.
Are you quite alright, Kyoko? Is there something about your gloves...?
I - oh! P-pardon me, ~name~.
Just as expected. W-we should move on.
Y-you... ~name~, are you...?
Your ~clothing~ was quite alluring, ~name~. When did you get it?
P-pardon me, ~name~. I didn't expect you'd lose your ~clothing~ before I even lost my sandals.
Don't compare yourself to me, ~name~. I'm doing much better than I thought I would!
Will you stay for another round, ~name~? You must know what that puts at risk.
Your ~clothing~ won't come to permanent harm. I assure you.
Aimee, what are you... oh. Oh, I see. Well... even with your skill, this is reckless.
What was... oh? Oh, I see. You've done this before. Still... can I ask you to refrain in the future?
Aimee, are you... mad? N-no... I... I'll admit, I don't... sense any danger, but...
Oh! I see. What... are you alright? The game isn't so important, you know...
Misato... you don't have to... but if you're ready, then... ~player~?
Ngh - Th-that's... I didn't think it'd actually...
~name~... is that not... cumbersome? I suppose you can't help it...
That seems... unfortunate, ~name~. If not for you, then...
Oh, ~name~ is going to remove her ~clothing~?
You shine with Farore's courage.
She's going to expose herself, and I've yet to lose my sandals. Perhaps I've already learned.
I didn't cheat! She simply didn't have luck on her side today.
You're going to see this through?
You should really think-
Aimee, I don't think-
This is a bad-
~name~, I don't... surely that's not a good idea, right ~player~?
R-really? Your ~clothing~ so soon? I... I suppose if that's your choice...
I'm sure everyone liked your ~clothing~, ~name~. Don't worry; there's no harm I can't avoid.
If anything happens to your ~clothing~, just come see me. I can undo anything.
I'm certain you won't miss your ~clothing~.
I don't think he's upset about losing his ~clothing~.
It wasn't much, but I won't complain.
Will you stay another round, ~name~?
Your ~clothing~ looked just fine. But I guess it's time to move on.
W-what? You can lose with such a good hand?
Y-you, ~player~? How can that hand lose?
You lost? We all had better hands?
Just as foreseen.
An excellent plan, ~name~. But I don't think that was your final loss.
So now that ~name~ has lost, he must...?
Surely if ~name~ didn't want you to see, he'd have simply left. R-right?
I've little need to observe such displays. Oracles are above these things.
If... if ~name~ can do that... then I can see this through.
~name~ is a-already... M-maybe this wasn't such a good idea...
Goodness, ~player~, is this why you chose ~name~ to play with us?
~name~ does seem to be... enjoying herself...
I'd thought that one person doing it was distracting.
D-don't let me interrupt your... bonding?
Should I have warned you, ~player~? I apologize.
I can't tell you what to keep, ~player~. That's cheating, remember?
~player~, you'll need to make it through this on your own.
Oh, ~player~ lost this time?
Don't get too excited, everyone. She's not a pushover.
~player~ lost! But just what has she lost?
Don't get discouraged, ~player~. I can play you a song, if you'd like.
I suppose I'll be... oh! ~player~? So I don't need a pair?
How unfortunate. Even a pair could have saved you.
I hope you tried your best, even if it didn't quite work out.
I see you didn't get very lucky this time. You'll stay another round, won't you?
What did you have, ~player~? Oh, I can see why that didn't carry you far.
I don't know what could've saved you, ~player~, and I certainly won't tell you which card it was.
I wanted to learn this game from you, ~player~. Perhaps I should just do what you don't.
~player~ lost. And with a pair, no less.
I think you'd be upset if you knew what your hand could've been, ~player~.
What an unforgiving game. A pair isn't enough, it seems.
Our hands were much the same, ~player~. What do the rules say about this?
We both had a pair? What does that mean?
So... what will you select first, ~player~?
I'd like to thank you for your choices this evening, ~player~. This might be more nerve-wracking with a man here.
She's done it. Nayru cover you, ~name~.
This, too, was unavoidable. Though I don't think that comforts you, ~name~.
~name~ has enough bravery for all of us!
That just- A-Aimee, I... I can't believe you're still standing!
Oh, my goodness! Are you okay? I can't believe that didn't hurt!
You're going to feel that later, aren't you? I can hardly believe it didn't hit... closer.
~name~ must not be happy. I'm not nearly as... exposed as she is.
Shall we continue?
Let's give her some space, everyone.
That all seems a bit... rough...
You should consider... n-never mind. Whatever you enjoy, I suppose.
W-what? You'll both...?
O-oh... you'll have your friend help? I... I suppose if that's within the rules...
Oh! He's... quite invested. I suppose... that makes sense.
~name~ doesn't have a lot of options left...
I'm certain you won't miss your ~clothing~.
I don't think she's upset about losing her ~clothing~.
It wasn't much, but I won't complain.
Oh, wonderful choice, ~name~! I love your ~clothing~.
Oh, but you have lovely ~clothing~! But... I guess that's just the game, isn't it?
Your ~clothing~ looked just fine. But I guess it's time to move on.
Just the ~clothing~? That's fair, really. Next round?
Will you stay another round, ~name~?
Oh! I... I didn't expect that to be...
B-Blake! I... I see. Well... your secret is safe with me.
Welcome back, Florina! I'm very proud of you for returning. That shows your courage.
Are you well, Florina? Take your time; we can wait for you, if you'd like.
W-what? You can lose with such a good hand?
Y-you, ~player~? How can that hand lose?
You lost? We all had better hands?
It's strange, though; you don't seem any less capable now than before.
But I can sense it even now; you can still hold your own.
See? She's doing just fine. Revy, would you at least consider disarming as well?
I'm glad you feel comfortable enough to disarm. Perhaps... that trend will continue.
I see your ~clothing~... is very important to you. It will be kept safe; you have my word.
I... I don't know what's wrong, Meia, but... I promise you, your ~clothing~ will be recovered safely.
W... what just...? You were supposed to...
I really liked your... your blazer... where did...?
Oh, good. See? There's no need for weapons in a place like this.
He's... I'm n-not surprised. Just... perhaps we ought to continue.
He's ready. To continue, I mean. Let us move forward.
~name~ is rather... exposed, isn't he?
Perhaps we should let ~name~... concentrate.
Ngh...~name~, it seems you have no problem... accomodating the others.
~player~... I trust you didn't expect this outcome...?
You couldn't have known this would happen, ~player~.
I... suppose you should enjoy yourself, ~player~. If you don't mind us continuing without you.
I don't know if I wanted to do this well...
I must be doing a bit too well...
With ~name~ out of the game... that only leaves the two of us.
Oh, he's just... I-I knew what this game entailed, but to see it with my own...
Th-there must be a first man out, ~name~.
~name~ is the first to... n-no, I'm not enamored. I can control myself.
I've seen Ralph like this many times. This... feels different, though.
I trust you're not ashamed, ~name~. For good reason.
N-Nine? Is... is that normal?
Wait... you don't have...?
I... I think I see why ~player~ asked you to join us.
You've been blessed by the goddess, ~name~.
~name~ couldn't have changed anything. This round held little for him.
Perhaps if you had instead traded... no, my apologies. Such knowledge is often a burden.
All our hands are relative. We can't all win.
I was right! Not that you're happy about that, right ~name~?
You can't give up, ~name~! You must see what the future has in store for you.
There must always be one, ~name~.
I'm sorry, but I cannot give you a second try. The game would go nowhere.
Might I suggest you set aside your armor? I can assure you, you won't need it.
It doesn't look like that armor of yours helps in poker. It might be a good item to remove.
Oh! Is it very common to have blue hair around here? I've never met anyone else like me.
~name~, please... I do wish you'd have chosen against bringing a weapon here.
May I ask that you disarm, ~name~? Surely there's little need for it here.
Oh. Should I have warned you that a pair wouldn't suffice?
Don't be upset, ~name~. There was nothing you could've done.
I suppose your hand just wasn't enough this time.
9S? How do you sense your cards with a blindfold on?
P-perhaps you should consider taking off your blindfold. C-can you see your cards?
Oh! Are you... oh. No, it's quite alright. You simply... remind me of someone I know. ~name~, is it?
Oh, ~name~! You're here, too? Wait a moment... my apologies. I confused you for... a good friend of mine.
Don't be so upset, Link. Still, it's good to actually hear you speak.
Oh, good. I was wondering why you were behaving so strangely. My Link had no problem speaking his mind.
Since ~name~ lost, does she have to...?
I'm sorry, ~name~, but you must know the forfeit. Don't feel as though you must.
I've little need to observe such displays. Oracles are above these things.
It would be a poor plan to give you another try, ~name~.
If... if ~name~ can do that... then I can see this through.
~name~ is a-already... M-maybe this wasn't such a good idea...
Should I have warned you, ~player~? I apologize.
I can't tell you what to keep, ~player~. That would be unfair.
~player~, you'll need to make it through this on your own.
Oh, ~player~ lost this time?
Don't get too excited, everyone. He can take care of himself.
~player~ lost! But just what has he lost?
Don't get discouraged, ~player~. I can play you a song, if you'd like.
I thought you were supposed to teach me some tricks, ~player~.
What poor fortune. You can still recover, right ~player~?
Oh, no! What happened, ~player~?
I suppose I'll be... oh! ~player~? So I don't need a pair?
How unfortunate. Even a pair could have saved you.
What can you say, ~player~? Surely you didn't expect that to save you.
Oh...I thought you would've kept your...never mind.
Our hands were much the same, ~player~. What do the rules say about this?
We both had a pair? What does that mean?
~player~ lost. And with a pair, no less.
I think you'd be upset if you knew what your hand could've been, ~player~.
What an unforgiving game. A pair isn't enough, it seems.
Oh, your cards are so good, ~player~! So... who lost?
Are you sure you've lost, ~player~? You had a...no, two! Two pairs?
What an interesting outcome. Don't you agree, ~player~?
To think, all the safety those four cards afforded you...
P-please, Jura. I doubt if ~player~ will start with something too revealing...
Don't get too excited, Jura. I suspect he'll start much like you did.
You mean to suggest that no other men wished to play this game with us?
It only - oh. That's only... no, my apologies. Don't mind me.
It's strange; I can only faintly sense... oh! D-don't mind me.
At least you still have some safety at hand.
What will you do now, ~name~?
Would anyone mind a song while we wait?
Only a fool seeks safety in cards.
Consider carefully what you'll remove first, ~name~.
Don't be upset if ~name~ doesn't start with something big.
What do you think ~name~ will start with? I have a guess...
Tch! That's not... shall we just move on?
~name~ is done. We should move on.
Take your time, ~name~. You can rest while we move on.
He's... finished. I suppose ~name~'s earned a rest.
~name~ has officially lost. But... I don't think he minds.
W-well, he... h-he... he's made no mess? Erm...
You look beautiful, ~name~. Are you a dancer?
Be confident, ~name~. You have nothing to fear.
Don't feel bad, ~name~. ~player~ asked for you by name!
You ah... you're rather... small for a Great Fairy... aren't you?
I see now. You are a bit too small to be a Great Fairy...
You look fine, ~name~. But would you still like to continue?
I didn't expect to do so well. ~name~ is just having an off day.
You don't regret your decision to play with us, do you?
I must be doing exceptionally! Oh, but... I'm sorry, ~name~. Don't worry; you aren't out of this yet!
You're certainly comely, ~name~. Be sure to cherish that.
Aimee! Are you okay?
Aimee! You... you cut it a bit close, didn't you?
W-what? Joetta... how in the world...?
I predict that ~name~ will take off her... hmm. Well, let's wait and see.
You can take your time choosing. Maybe a song would help...?
Don't overthink it.
What will you choose?
I think you're worrying too much, Blake. Your bow is cute, but surely you won't miss it that much.
You have a cute bow, Blake, but if you're so worried, I promise I can keep it safe.
Don't worry, ~player~. She's only so nervous because you're here, anyway.
Don't try and chase her, ~player~. You're the reason she's fled, anyway.
Let her go, ~player~. It's only nerves.
Florina! Oh, no. I was hoping... oh. Never mind; here she comes again.
I should thank you for setting your sword aside, really.
Thank you, Jura. I hope everyone feels a bit safer.
Just the ~clothing~? That's fair, really. N-next...
I won? I'm sorry, everybody; I thought I was being fair. You aren't upset, are you?
Thank goodness that's over. Please, clean yourselves up.
Wait a moment...that means I've won? Already? I... I promise, I didn't use my power!
I can hardly believe it. Of all the ways this game could have gone...
Oh! She's... quite invested. I suppose... that makes sense.
~name~ doesn't have a lot of options left...
But you are invested in this game, aren't you? Nothing's amiss... right?
Don't be afraid, Misato. I'm sure nobody will mock you.
I don't need to be an oracle to know what he's taking off next.
Do you know what you'll choose next, ~name~?
What do you think is coming off next?
This may not be my favorite part of the game, but don't let that discourage you.
I suppose we can expect nothing more of ~name~, can we?
~name~ is spent. Let her rest, now.
~name~ is now truly finished. Is she not permitted to leave yet?
Aimee! Are you okay?
Gasp! You've been hit! I knew this was a bad idea!
It's quite alright, ~name~. We won't force you to do anything you're not comfortable with. Right, ~player~?
She'll be taking off her ~clothing~. Be nice.
Gasp! Kyu, that's amazing! Can- erm...
What an interesting use of magic! How did- o-oh!
A-are you sure this is still a good idea? I-I mean... you have no protection...
Nobody finds this easy, Florina. But... I think you can do this. You're stronger than you know.
Focus on the game, everyone. Unless you'd like to join ~name~ soon?
Just because ~name~ is... finished with the game, doesn't mean we can't continue without him.
~name~ can't help anyone now. Except perhaps... but enough of that.
So this is what the latter end of this game is like...
They're... enjoying themselves, I suppose.
Do you think ~name~ is watching... no, my apologies. Don't mind me.
I'm sure everyone liked your ~clothing~, ~name~. Don't worry; there's no harm I can't avoid.
If anything happens to your ~clothing~, just come see me. I can undo anything.
Aimee, surely there's a better way to strip than using a weapon.
Aimee, you can take your time in the future. P-please.
I... I suppose I can recover your clothing intact, if you will it. But... it would be easier if you didn't destroy it.
Kyoko... wh... when did that happen to you?
Don't be ashamed, Kyoko. We all have our scars; some more evident than others.
You could have kept your gloves on all game, Kyoko. I applaud your bravery.
O-oh. I thought I would be prepared for this.
N-no, this was not unexpected.
I... of course I foresaw this. Only...
He's losing his... w-well, this is the goal of the game... I s-suppose.
I have nothing to fear.
I can sense safety in this hand.
I may not know this game well, but... I think this will protect me.
Oh, this looks safe.
I believe this will help.
Nine? Nine "S"? I don't mean to be disrespectful; I've never heard a name like that!
I erm... I would rather not partake, Sei. But thank you for the offer!
If you couldn't beat me before, you don't have a chance now.
I'm doing really well! And it looks like that trend will continue.
I... I don't know if I'll stay to the end of this game. Nobody minds, right?
How wonderful! Oh, you won't mind if I must withdraw, will you ~player~?
Are you ready to see what the cards have in store, ~player~?
An Oracle deserves better, you know.
I suppose these will suffice.
I'm not worried. Even defeat here won't be the end of me.
This will... will this work?
Nine? Nine "S"? I don't mean to be disrespectful; I've never heard a name like that!
Oh! Are you a Great Fairy? What sort of power can you grant?
A... a Great Fairy? Here? W-well... what manner of power do you offer?
There's something here. Something...
Monika... do you feel well? There's something wrong...
I'm sorry, Monika. It's not you. Let's... move on. I'm Nayru. Good to meet you.
No, I... I'm sorry, Monika. I shouldn't have addressed you. My name is Nayru; pleasure to meet you.
It's nothing, I'm sure. Perhaps I was rude; I'm Nayru. It's nice to meet you.
Light and darkness have come at the same time...
~player~... I trust you know who you've selected for this game.
~player~, this may not be a good idea. We don't want to start a fight.
I can sense great good here. You've chosen well, ~player~.
We're in the presence of great good. There's nothing to fear here.
~player~... why have you brought me here?
Beware, ~player~. There is great evil here.
Guard yourself well, ~player~. We are among great evil.
I sense a power here, though I can't place it...
I can feel a great power among us. Perhaps we can learn from each other while we play.
I can sense great concern. Please, be at ease; just tell me if you need a moment.
Deep breaths, everyone. There's nothing to be afraid of here.
Don't worry; I'm sure we can take our time this evening. Right, ~player~?
Oh! So you go to school together? A... are you aware of the nature of this game...?
Are you taking a break from your studies? Well... I suppose if you're here, you must be of age...
Don't worry; we're all friends here. There's nothing to be afraid of.
It'll be okay; if anyone needs a moment, just let me know. I'll give you all the time in the world.
I know what you've asked of me, ~player~. Even so, I may need to depart before long.
I trust that I won't be missed if I must depart.
It would be unwise for me to stay here too long. Nobody minds, right?
~player~, I'm happy to join for a bit, but... you won't be upset if I must go, will you?
This... doesn't seem like a good hand. Maybe ~cards~ will help.
None of these cards look alike. Grant me ~cards~.
I can sense that ~cards~ will serve me best.
Let us see what ~cards~ will give me.
This is familiar... I'll need ~cards~.
With so many possibilities, I don't know what would be best. Perhaps ~cards~.
~cards~, and I'll see what I can do with them.
Can I pick my own cards? No? Very well...~cards~, then.
I'm sure Ralph would know what to do. ~cards~, please.
Grant me ~cards~.
May I have ~cards~?
I would like... ~cards~, please.
I'll take ~cards~.
~cards~, if I may. I would like to thank you for bringing me here, ~player~.
I feel as if a weight has been lifted. ~cards~, please.
I think I like spending time with you two. Maybe... I'll see this game through after all.
I'm beginning to get the hang of this. ~cards~, please.
I'm growing curious. How will this game end, I wonder...?
I'm... I'm not afraid any more. Haha! Let's keep going! I'll take ~cards~.
Okay, ~player~. I've changed my mind. I... I'll keep playing.
I'm beginning to get the hang of this. ~cards~, please.
~cards~, if I may. I would like to thank you for bringing me here, ~player~.
I feel as if a weight has been lifted. ~cards~, please.
I'm... I'm not afraid any more. Haha! Let's keep going! I'll take ~cards~.
Okay, ~player~. I've changed my mind. I... I'll keep playing.
I think the four of us are really getting along! Maybe I'll finish this game after all.
I'm growing curious. How will this game end, I wonder...?
I'm beginning to get the hang of this. ~cards~, please.
~cards~, if I may. I would like to thank you for bringing me here, ~player~.
I feel as if a weight has been lifted. ~cards~, please.
I'm... I'm not afraid any more. Haha! Let's keep going! I'll take ~cards~.
Okay, ~player~. I've changed my mind. I... I'll keep playing.
Even with a full table... this is easier than I'd thought. Perhaps I'll see how this game ends.
I'm growing curious. How will this game end, I wonder...?
Oh, you'd like some cards back? Very well, take these ~cards~.
I may not understand this game yet, but I'll learn fast. ~cards~, please.
Hmm... I think I'll start with ~cards~.
May I think it over? Hmm... ~cards~.
Would it be unfair to borrow cards from another game?
Do you think cards like these existed 500 years ago?
What sort of cards am I looking for? Perhaps if I had ~cards~ more...
Oh. I see.
There is little safety here.
I suppose I can't complain.
I'm sorry, everyone; I'll get the hang of this soon!
Nine? Nine "S"? I don't mean to be disrespectful; I've never heard a name like that!
Oh! Are you a Great Fairy? What sort of power can you grant?
A... a Great Fairy? Here? W-well... what manner of power do you offer?
There's something here. Something...
Monika... do you feel well? There's something wrong...
I'm sorry, Monika. It's not you. Let's... move on. I'm Nayru. Good to meet you.
No, I... I'm sorry, Monika. I shouldn't have addressed you. My name is Nayru; pleasure to meet you.
It's nothing, I'm sure. Perhaps I was rude; I'm Nayru. It's nice to meet you.
Oh! So you go to school together? A... are you aware of the nature of this game...?
Are you taking a break from your studies? Well... I suppose if you're here, you must be of age...
I do understand the nature of this game, ~player~. I hope you don't mind if I excuse myself soon.
I hope you all don't mind if I excuse myself soon. It won't be long with cards like this.
I understand you all enjoy this game. Still, I'm afraid I may need to leave before the game is done.
I'll play by the rules, but I'm afraid I may not be seeing this game to the end.
Is there any rule which would require me to stay to the end?
I understand.
What? It would be no fun to win every hand.
I knew I'd lose this round. It still stings, though.
Don't expect me to lose every round, ~player~.
It seems I still have much to learn.
Is it my turn? Oh, if I must.
So you've overcome my hand. I know what's next.
I suppose I didn't manage a very good hand, did I?
That was a poor showing for an oracle...
I'd hoped for at least a pair.
W-what? Me? Are you sure? I had a pair and everything...
I had the worst hand? I... I suppose a pair isn't very good, is it?
And all the safety those three brought me... for naught.
I... I hardly know whether I got lucky or unlucky...
I lost? With two pairs? My, my... you're all quite skilled.
P-pardon? I... I was wrong...?
You all managed to best two pairs? I... I may be outclassed here...
Are you two working together? ~player~?
It seems you've both managed a better hand than me. Don't presume that that will continue.
I suppose you've both won.
Oh, I had the worst hand? Out of all of us?
All four of you beat me? I... I must have a lot to learn...
So many hands better than mine.
I'd hoped I would have a better hand than someone. Oh, well.
I've lost the very first hand? This doesn't bode well...
I've already lost? Oh, dear.
Let's see now, who's lost first? It was... oh.
Already? There must be something I'm missing...
And the first round takes... me. I suppose that was expected.
I lost? Okay. Even I can't win every round.
Don't look at me like that, ~player~. I'm still new to this game.
I wish Ralph were here.
And I already started at a disadvantage...
I was already off to a poor start. Perhaps if I count my harp...?
These bracelets were a gift from Ralph. Please guard them well.
I won't pretend to give up the Harp of Ages. I'm never really separated from it.
Does anyone want to hold my harp? Don't worry, I promise you won't end up lost in the past.
I'll start with my bracelets.
Nothing major, everyone. Just an accessory.
